content: Where does Backdrop fit in this: "There will be three main tracks this year: Drupal for Beginners, Advanced Drupal, and Marketing & Communications" with this?: "we are looking for unique content so if you submit a session you have given in the past, it will be rejected." (https://2020.badcamp.org/sessions)

Maybe here: "We invite folks to be brave with their submissions and push boundaries!"

:-)
Definitely there! :wink:
Yeah, I'm fairly certain that's not what they meant when they said that.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) we can do Backdrop sessions at the summit / min-camp if they are not accepted at badcamp propper
Ohh, I missed the deadline. I was still considering a submission on Sunday. But, then I spaced it.
